Reviews.Title: Don't Bother
Reviews.Author: Courtney M. Paris
Reviews.Content: Turn back! I bought this camera for my son for Christmas and it is just horrible. The pictures are bad, the lcd screen is bad and has pixels going out left and right, and wow does it suck batteries dry!not worth it.

Reviews.Title: Worst waste of resources
Reviews.Author: J. Eckardt
Reviews.Content: I have the silver 98379 which isn't on Amazon.com anywhere otherwise I would leave my review there.I bought this product somewhere other than Amazon.com and have had problems with it right out of the packaging. The software isn't working at all. The LCD screen is kinda dark and the pictures from what I can see on the screen are horribly pixelated and off color. You would think that in this day and age where we can get gigs of storage on flash drives that are cheaper than this camera that the camera would be better built and would have a nicer picture quality.
